doc:
Christian Borle https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Christian_Borle 0 Christian Dominique Borle (born October 1, 1973) is an American actor in theatre, television, and film. He is a two-time Tony Award winner for his roles as Black Stache in Peter and the Starcatcher and as William Shakespeare in Something Rotten!. Borle originated the role of Emmett in Legally Blonde on Broadway, starred as Tom Levitt on the NBC musical-drama television series Smash, and starred as Marvin in the 2016 Broadway revival of Falsettos. Christian_Dominique_Borle ( born October_1_,_1973 ) is an_American_actor in theatre_,_television , and film . He is a_two-time_Tony_Award_winner for his_roles as Black_Stache in Peter and the_Starcatcher and as William_Shakespeare in Something_Rotten ! . Borle originated the_role of Emmett in Legally_Blonde on Broadway , starred as Tom_Levitt on the_NBC_musical-drama_television_series_Smash , and starred as Marvin in the_2016_Broadway_revival of Falsettos .
